lead_paragraph: E Fund Management, China's second-largest asset management company, plans to start the nation's first officially registered hedge fund after the securities regulator eased rules in July, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: E Fund Management, China's second-largest asset management company, plans to start the nation's first officially registered hedge fund after the securities regulator eased rules in July, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: China to Get First Official Hedge Fund

abstract: E Fund Management, China's second-largest asset management company, plans to start the nation's first officially registered hedge fund after the securities regulator eased rules in July, Bloomberg News reported.
